name: flosser
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small plastic object for cleaning between your teeth, or a piece of electrical equipment for doing the same thing: Using a flosser daily will help prevent gum disease. The electric flosser is the latest dental technology, performing at 10,000 strokes per minute no less.
IgorKovalchuk/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesDental flossers remove plaque from places your brush can't reach.Dr Robinson invented the WaterPik automatic flosser.The Oral-B Hummingbird is a tiny and eminently portable battery-powered flosser.
